long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bulk Barcode Generator is a powerful browser extension designed to simplify and streamline the process of creating multiple barcodes. Whether you're a business owner, inventory manager, or event organizer, this extension offers a quick and efficient solution for all your barcode generation needs.

Key Features
- Batch Creation: Generate multiple barcodes simultaneously, saving you valuable time and effort.
- Customization Options: Tailor your codes to your specific requirements with adjustable colors, sizes, and formats.
- Flexible Input Methods: Enter data manually or upload CSV/Excel files for larger datasets.
- Personalized codes: Customize the display text and style to make your barcodes unique and brand-specific.
- Convenient Download: Automatically package your generated barcodes into a compressed file for easy access and distribution.
- Bulk Barcode Generator supports the following barcode types: CODE128, EAN/UPC, CODE39, ITF-14, MSI, Pharmacode, Codabar


How to Use Bulk Barcode Creator

1. Access the extension: Click on the Free Bulk Barcode Creator icon in your browser toolbar to open the main interface.
2. Input Your Data: Enter your text in the input box, with each line representing a separate barcode. 
3. Customize Your Codes: Click the "Generate" button to access the customization page. Here, you can review your input and make any necessary adjustments.
4. Personalize Your Design: Take advantage of our customization options to tailor your barcodes. Adjust colors, sizes, and download formats. Add custom display text to make your barcodes stand out.
5. Generate and Download: Once you're satisfied with your settings, click "Generate" to create your barcodes. The extension will automatically compile them into a compressed file waiting for download.


Mass Barcode Generator offers a user-friendly interface coupled with powerful functionality. It's designed to cater to both individual users and businesses of all sizes. Whether you need to create a handful of barcodes or thousands, our extension provides a seamless and efficient solution.
